articles.title: Headwall Investments Acquires Sunset Ridge Shopping Center in San Antonio, TX
articles.mainIdea: Headwall Investments Acquires Sunset Ridge Shopping Center in San Antonio, TX
articles.summary: PR Newswire: Headwall Investments Acquires Sunset Ridge Shopping Center in San Antonio, TX. Headwall Investments, a Texas-based commercial real estate investment and development firm specializing in neighborhood shopping centers and urban infill opportunities, has closed on the off-market acquisition of Sunset Ridge Shopping Center in San Antonio, TX in a joint venture with Houston-based Fifth Corner.
